availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Hall (Henry County, Kentucky, wool carder)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, wool carder. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Jane Grigsby. Father of Ovelius Hall, Alphons Hall, Euphamaceia Hall, Thomas Hall, and Mary Hall. Wool carder in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 355
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259288, p. 72.
